CREATE_ABSENCE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ABSENCE (ID INTEGER, HOUR INTEGER, DAY INTEGER, MONTH INTEGER, YEAR INTEGER, ASSIGNMENTID INTEGER, STUDENTID INTEGER);
CREATE_APPSETTINGS: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS APPSETTINGS (SCHOOLNAME TEXT, SCHOOLLOGOURL TEXT);
CREATE_ASSIGNMENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ASSIGNMENT (CLASSROOMID INTEGER, SUBJECTID INTEGER, TEACHERID INTEGER);
CREATE_LISTITEM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name} (ID INTEGER, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_STUDENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENT (ID INTEGER, FIRSTNAME TEXT, LASTNAME TEXT);
CREATE_STUDENTCLASSROOM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENTCLASSROOM (STUDENTID INTEGER, CLASSROOMID INTEGER);
INSERT_ABSENCE: INSERT INTO ABSENCE (ID, HOUR, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, ASSIGNMENTID, STUDENTID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT_ASSIGNMENT: INSERT INTO ASSIGNMENT (CLASSROOMID, SUBJECTID, TEACHERID) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
INSERT_STUDENT: INSERT INTO STUDENT (ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
SELECT_ABSENCE: SELECT ID, HOUR, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, ASSIGNMENTID, STUDENTID FROM ABSENCE;
SELECT_ASSIGNMENT: SELECT CLASSROOMID, SUBJECTID, TEACHERID FROM ASSIGNMENT;
SELECT_STUDENT: SELECT ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME FROM STUDENT;
